extendedInfo.description: Itâs time to reimagine employee productivityâwith mobile. Introducing Cornerstone MobileÂ®, which brings the power of productivity and real-time connection to the workforce. From the leader in cloud-based talent management software, Cornerstone OnDemandâ¢, Cornerstone Mobile directly connects employees to learning, performance and recruiting activities and provides anytime access to courses and content. Employees will have everything they need right on the mobile devices they already rely on. With Cornerstone Mobile solutions, deliver an easy mobile app that has the power to take productivity further than you ever imagined.Key Cornerstone Mobile features include:- User-rich employee profiles - Instant access to mobile training and courses- Access to job requisitions and applicant profiles- On-demand access to performance observation checklists** The Cornerstone Mobile app is designed for use by Cornerstone OnDemand clients and requires authorized Cornerstone credentials.**Important: If you are a Cornerstone OnDemand client experiencing trouble logging in, contact your Cornerstone OnDemand administrator. Contact your Cornerstone OnDemand Account Manager or Client Success Manager for more details.www.cornerstoneondemand.com/mobileFollow Us: @CornerstoneIncAbout Cornerstone OnDemandCornerstone OnDemand is a leading global provider of comprehensive talent management solutions delivered as Software-as-a-Service (SaaS). Our solutions are designed to enable organizations to meet the challenges they face in empowering and maximizing the productivity of their human capital. Our core solution is an integrated, cloud-based suite that consists of the Cornerstone Recruiting Cloud, the Cornerstone Performance Cloud, the Cornerstone Learning Cloud and the Cornerstone Extended Enterprise Cloud. Our clients use our core solution to source and recruit top talent, develop employees throughout their careers, engage employees effectively, improve business execution, cultivate future leaders, and integrate with their external networks of customers, vendors and distributors.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love the acces to portals on the go and I hear there\'s going to be quite a few enhancements in the future, can\'t wait. Great job staying innovative Cornerstone.
reviews.author: Shane Carter

reviews.title: Love that i can find people using my directory and take training!
reviews.comment: My company\'s directory is available on the go (and i can call directly from the app) and can take training on the go!
reviews.author: Christina Albright

reviews.comment: Great app for mobile talent management!
reviews.author: Matt L.

reviews.title: Reliable
reviews.comment: I love how this app keeps me easily connected to my team.
reviews.author: Kenny Chow

reviews.title: Excellent Mobile App!
reviews.comment: Perfect tool for quick access to my team\'s information, mobile training content, and more!  Great job, team!
reviews.author: Dustin Cann

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: Easy to use and gives me access when I\'m away from the office.
reviews.author: Mark Nicolosi

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great to be able to use CSOD on the move!
reviews.author: Marco V

reviews.title: How to use this app if sso is implemented?
reviews.comment: Back button in note 2 is closing the app instead of previous page.
reviews.author: Ganesh Durupudi

reviews.title: Useful app when I am on the move
reviews.comment: This is a really easy to use application.  It is fast and easy to navigate and useful when I am away from my office. Thanks Cornerstone - another great product enhancement.
reviews.author: Craig Caplan

reviews.title: Simple & easy to use when I am away from my desk
reviews.comment: When i am away from my desk and need quick access to my training materials or to my colleagues, I find this simple and easy to use app to be a great help. Great app from Cornerstone.
reviews.author: Eitan Avner

reviews.title: Kind of incredibly amazing.
reviews.comment: Already use this constantly at the office and at home. Just as awesome on the go.
reviews.author: Justin Wedell

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Great app for quick reference when I am away from my desk.
reviews.author: Heather Martin
